sections.heading: of business partnership or limited liability company; not prohibited
sections.text: Nothing in the Public Accountancy Act or the rules and regulations adopted and promulgated under the act shall be construed to prohibit a person holding a certificate as a certified public accountant from forming a business partner

1-164.02.Formation of business partnership or limited liability company; not prohibited.

Nothing in the Public Accountancy Act or the rules and regulations adopted and promulgated under the act shall be construed to prohibit a person holding a certificate as a certified public accountant from forming a business partnership or limited liability company with a person not holding a certificate or permit.

SourceLaws 1984, LB 473, ยง 23;Laws 1993, LB 121, ยง 59;Laws 1997, LB 114, ยง 57;Laws 2009, LB31, ยง 36.
